seed_pair.target: Ellos dijeron lo que querían hacer.
seed_pair.known: They said what they wanted to do.

seed_pair.target: Ellos no dijeron lo que querían hacer.
seed_pair.known: They didn't say what they wanted to do.
Did they say who they saw last night?

seed_pair.target: Nuestros amigos vinieron como a las seis.
seed_pair.known: Our friends came round at about six o'clock.

seed_pair.target: Tuvimos que irnos porque los niños estaban cansados.
seed_pair.known: We had to leave because the children were tired.

seed_pair.target: Puede que esté allí pero no es muy probable.
seed_pair.known: He might be there but it's not very likely.

seed_pair.target: Parte del problema es el número de áreas diferentes.
seed_pair.known: Part of the problem is the number of different areas.

seed_pair.target: Todo era mucho más fácil en el pasado.
seed_pair.known: It was all much easier in the past.

seed_pair.target: No estaba enfrente de la señal azul.
seed_pair.known: It wasn't in front of the blue sign.

seed_pair.target: Quiero encontrar una tienda cerca del hotel.
seed_pair.known: I want to find a shop near the hotel.
